title: Anticlaim Mechanic

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player and a role each night. If your target is the role you chose, they will be roleblocked tonight through immunities. If their subalignment is investigative, they'll instead receive random results.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock immune. (Mechanics repair and maintain machinery which they cannot do if they're roleblocked.)
- You may multitask.
